name: Mirror Force
description:
MirrorForce is a minimalist game with a simple goal-Escape the Enemies. It is my first gameJam attempt. 

The gameplay is simple; you have to control your player with the arrow keys but there is a catch! You have another player that mirrors the original players movement.

Be Careful!

Made in VS code with JS and Matter Libraries

Matter JS Library used:-

https://brm.io/matter-js/

I will make all of the code open source so someone with a better vision can make a more awesome Game.
